snippet: The French choreographer Maud Le Pladec presented “Democracy,” a work laced with percussion and special lighting effects, at New York Live Arts.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews United States debut of Maud Le Pladec dance piece Democracy, performed at New York Live Arts as part of Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas.
lead_paragraph: The French choreographer Maud Le Pladec presented “Democracy,” a work laced with percussion and special lighting effects, at New York Live Arts.

headline.main: In a Mosh Pit, or Maybe a Revolution
headline.print_headline: In a Mosh Pit, or Maybe a Revolution
